CustomField.formula: "Booking Date "+ TEXT(Date_of_Booking__c)+ ". "& BR()& "Departure Date - "+TEXT(Date_of_Travel__c)+". "& BR()& "Route - " & Departure_City__c +" - "& Arrival_City__c+". "& BR()& "Class of service - " + Class_of_Service__c+" "& BR()& "Airline - " + Airline__c+" Flight#"+ Flight_Number__c+"."& BR()& "PNR - "+ PNR__c
CustomField.label: AIR SUMMARY
